org.apache.giraph.zk

类 GiraphZooKeeperAdmin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.zk.GiraphZooKeeperAdmin
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool, org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher

    public class GiraphZooKeeperAdmin
extends Object
implements org.apache.zookeeper.Watcher, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool
    A Utility class to be used by Giraph admins to occasionally clean up the ZK remnants of jobs that have failed or were killed before finishing. Usage (note that defaults are used if giraph.XYZ args are missing): bin/giraph-admin -Dgiraph.zkBaseNode=... -Dgiraph.zkList=... -Dgiraph.zkServerPort=... -cleanZk alterantely, the Configuration file will populate these fields as it would in a bin/giraph run. WARNING: Obviously, running this while actual Giraph jobs using your cluster are in progress is not recommended.

      • doZooKeeperCleanup

        public void doZooKeeperCleanup(ZooKeeperExt zooKeeper,
                      String zkBasePath)
                        throws org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException,
                               InterruptedException
        Cleans the ZooKeeper quorum of in-memory failed/killed job fragments.
        参数:
        zooKeeper - the connected ZK instance (session) to delete from.
        zkBasePath - the base node to begin erasing from.
        抛出:
        org.apache.zookeeper.KeeperException
        InterruptedException
